result.execSummary:
The defendant Ricardo R. Tzintzun was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Contempt of Court/Disobey Order, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 785.01(1)(b).
  • Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with: Count 2 of this case

miscConds.notes: Defendant is ordered to pay the DNA surcharge, and to make arrangements to provide a DNA sample, within 48 hours, for testing through the Clark County Sheriff Department or if on probation, to the Department of Corrections as is required in all criminal convictions. Costs to be paid on a schedule established by the agent.  $500 bond from 2015CM203 to be applied to costs.

The defendant shall attend counseling as directed by the agent, and shall make all counseling records available to the Department of Corrections.  Defendant is to comply with all Court Orders of all cases.  Defendant was ordered to report to the probation and parole office by 10:00 am 4/8/16.
Defendant is able to apply for this case to be expunged if defendant successfully, at 100%, completes all conditions of probation.
The defendant shall pay Department of Correction fees as directed by the agent.

timeConds.notes:
Defendant is granted 40 days credit
 Jail is on Count 1 only

judgments.dispoDesc: Clark County Cases 2016CM64 and 2015CM203 are dismissed but read into this case.

supervisions.notes:
Conditions of probation for Count 2 are same as Count 1.  40 days County Jail is for Count 1 only.
Concurrent with: Count 1 of this case

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid on a schedule established by the agent.

records.addlTxt: Prosecutor, Kerra Stumbris, and Defendant, Ricardo R. Tzintzun in custody, appeared with Attorney Christine Kuczynski.  Joint recommendation stated. Defendant pleads guilty to Counts 1 and 2 in 2016CM39.  Court finds defendant guilty and convicted of Counts 1 and 2 in 2016CM39.  2016CM64 is dismissed and read in.  2015CM203 is dismissed and read in.
Adjourned initial appearance on April 7, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
Obey all orders and rules that are applicable to you, attend school, be on time and not be late and only be excused by written authorization by a medical professional

Prosecutor Kerra Stumbris and Defendant, Ricardo R. Tzintzun appeared, pro se    Defendant acknowledged receipt of complaint.  Defendant advised of right to an attorney  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 31, 2016 at 03:00 pm.
